name: calibre-web
description: Calibre-Web is a self-hosted web app to browse, read, and manage eBooks stored in a Calibre database. It features OPDS, Kindle syncing, user roles, and metadata editing from a browser.

features.title: Ebook Management
features.description: Browse and manage Calibre library through web browser. Access anywhere

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Compatible with OPDS readers for mobile access. Universal compatibility

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Send books directly to Kindle devices. Seamless reading

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multi-user support with permission controls. Shared library

features.title: Metadata Editing
features.description: Edit book information from browser. Complete control

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your eBook collection private. Data sovereignty
